Text:
We lost cable all last week. Now my gf is very happy to be able to catch up. She is addicted to this show.

Thank you so much!

FYI: Aspect ratio looks incorrect on episode 41 (i.e. everybody looks tall & thin) and possibly the other episodes as well. Resolution is at 542x390 (instead of the previous episodes' 624x352). KMP allows stretching, back to the correct, wide AR.

But I'm still very Thankful for these uploads. They are a million times better than the non-existent ones elsewhere on the net.
